Title: Twitter on Windows Phone 7
Description: Twitter application made in Silverlight 4 for Windows Phone 7. This project is made in Silverlight 4 using C# code and Twitter API to communicate with Twitter.com.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Twitter application made in Silverlight 4 for Windows Phone 7. This project is made in Silverlight 4 using C# code and Twitter API to communicate with Twitter.com.
